replies.body: You can tell its fake....Its Lore is super long
just around a year ago, before Azir was released and all Shurima champs had lore down to a paragraph, all lore was long and detailed, giving the champ a real past before League of Legends.

> [{quoted}](name=NaTionzOG,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=eXooREkl,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-01-12T12:09:30.816+0000)
>
> You can tell its fake....Its Lore is super long

wtf that does not mean its fake

While this is clearly a player made champ (for those below who think it is real) this is a really well thought out kit (though possibly really strong) and really should be looked at by riot to see if they actually want to contact these guys and either hire them (cause they clearly all know what they are doing) or talk to them about using their concept (cause it's an amazing concept.)
wtf is this real
I don't know if this was done by Riot or some other ppl but it looks awesome and clearly a lot of effort has gone into it.

> [{quoted}](name=kfitz45,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=eXooREkl,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-01-12T07:51:52.003+0000)

he will come out like around the time illaoi came out

I think they should releasse this sigil, it would add a new area for them to base champions around, since they are running low on homeland based champs like tham how he is just king of all the rivers.. he doesnt actually belong to any place like cait belongs to piltover and malz to the void.
This is too real to be real. As of Riot make is this . Is too detail for Riot, they dont care about the game as long as they make money.

actually they care heaps about the game, why else do you think they bring new champions, with highly detailed pages for themselves, for example when Reksai came out, and Tahm kench, they had a full page that was theme related to the champion, they take pride in their champions, stop giving them a hard time.  {{champion:41}} Korpse out

The symbol on his forehead is _very _similar to the symbol that floats above a champion's head when Kindred marks them.

Has Rito seen this before?
that mark on his head kinda looks like kindreds mark, an judging by the splash art, theres little version of this champion, kinda like how kindred has its partner or ally or whatever
This is an awesome community concept!
this https://www.behance.net/gallery/17453071/League-Of-Legends Is a project made by the same people. It's not Riot because if it was we would have this instead of the layout we have now.

WHOA! even if this isn't  official. The guy who made this put so much hard work and effort into making this look legit. I can respect it either way.
 {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
ok
